import DotEnvWarning from '../../../../../_admonitions/_warning_dot_env.md';

<DotEnvWarning />

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/wallet.rs/tree/develop/wallet/examples/16_destroy_alias.rs
```

Before you run the example you should update the `alias_id` to one available in your account.

Run the example by running the following command:

```bash
cargo run --example destroy_alias --release
```
